# mipmapsMode

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the resource should generate mipmaps for each drawable’s texture after it was updated.

## Declaration

```swift
var mipmapsMode: TextureResource.MipmapsMode
```
title: mipmapsMode
